[[This will not make sense if you do not know what Pokemon is.]]
[[A seemingly infite row of Pikachu stands, each next to an open pokÃ©ball. The pokemon on the end of the row, nearest to the trainers, has a closed pokÃ©ball.]]
Pikachu: Pikachu, I choose YOU!

title: Win by Induction
